homepage_header_yourcompany: Your company on another management level
homepage_header_webhave: Navigate towards success with My Menthor as your management compass, guiding your organizational journey from the business model to strategy execution.
homepage_section1_desc1: It operates as an internal digital mentor that helps organize the company from the strategic to the operational level.
homepage_section1_desc2: My Menthor is a Business Architecture SaaS platform that enhances process visibility by integrating strategy, people, and technology to improve organizational performance and maturity.
homepage_section2_getatrue: Obtain a comprehensive representation of your company's operations. Transform fragmented information into a cohesive knowledge base, generating insights to support effective strategic decisions.
homepage_section2_Rethink: Develop a business architecture that delivers more value to customers and partners. Drive growth and competitiveness by adopting an integrated approach to understanding, improving, and transforming your operations.
homepage_section2_Transform: Transform your corporate architecture into a valuable asset to manage changes in your operation, anticipating and adapting to the impacts of market transformations.
homepage_section2_Ensure: Ensure the deployment of the strategy to the other layers of the organization, integrating processes, structure, technology, people and other organizational components to improve business results.
homepage_section3_Breaking: Breaking down silos and building bridges to organizational effectiveness
homepage_section3_The_platform: The platform facilitates the rethinking of the organization at all layers, from the strategic to the operational level, represented by the pyramid with various dimensions.
homepage_section3_It_facilitates: She unfolds the company's strategy into an end-to-end process-oriented vision, aligning organizational components to achieve business goals.
homepage_section3_To_make_smarter: By providing process visibility, she reduces the problem of disconnection between strategy, processes, people, and technology, which impacts inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction. She reduces the fragmented view and integrates areas around common goals and shared indicators. </br></br> Helps managers and teams optimize processes, reducing resource waste and the complexity of managing daily operations.
homepage_section4_My_Menthor: My Menthor has a human-centered approach, transforming tacit knowledge into explicit.
homepage_section4_It_acts_as: It acts as an information hub, organizing knowledge in a single repository.
homepage_section_5_My_Menthor: My Menthor is the complete platform to your company's performance
homepage_section_6_Explore: Explore insights and expert tips on our blog.
homepage_section_6_Develop: Develop skills related to Business Architecture.
homepage_section_6_Take_part: Take part in our events and webinars to keep up to date with our ecosystem.
homepage_section_6_Access_our: The knowledge base on the platform leads to solving business challenges.
homepage_section_6_Discover_the_resource: Discover the resources available to you, stay updated about the best articles, events and knowledge about the platform.
produtos_BusinessArchitecturePlatform: My Menthor is a Business Architecture SaaS platform that enhances process visibility by integrating strategy, people, and technology to improve organizational performance and maturity.
produtos_DeploymentAndExecutionOfStrateg: It operates as an internal digital mentor that helps organize the company from the strategic to the operational level.
produtos_ItIsAManagementTool: It is a management tool that uses an architectural approach to analyze and integrate strategy, processes, structure and other organizational components, boosting organizational performance and alignment. Whereas transactional systems such as ERP focus on automating operational transactions and operational processes.
produtos_AsAProcessOriented: A Business Architecture software creates a digital twin of an organization, enabling impact assessment and various strategic analyses.
produtos_BreakingDownSilosAndBuildingBri: Breaking down silos and building bridges to organizational effectiveness
produtos_ThePlatformMakesItEasier: The platform makes it easier to rethink the organization at all levels, from the strategic to the operational, represented by the operational level, represented by the pyramid with various dimensions.
produtos_ItFacilitatesTheImplementationO: It facilitates the implementation of the strategy by unfolding it in a horizontal perspective for the processes of the value chain, synchronizing the organizational elements in a vision oriented bycross-cutting processes to ensure effective strategy execution.
produtos_ToMakeSmarterBusinessDecisions: To make smarter business decisions, you need a uniform view of the operation, with a true representation of how the business works and how it adds value to customers and partners.
produtos_TheMyMenthorProvidesAView: The My Menthor provides a view of the business model that will transform your fragmented understanding of the business into uniform knowledge and integrated action to improvements or transformations.
produtos_ItSupportsDifferentLevelsOfMatu: It supports different levels of maturity and deployment strategies through its modular and flexible approach.
produtos_ItContainsItsOwnEmbeddedMethodo: Strengthens the tactical level, filling a gap often neglected between strategy and day-to-day operations.
produtos_EmphasizesBusinessProcessManage: Provides specialized support through a team of highly qualified professionals, in addition to a network of specialized partners.
produtos_DecompplicatesAndDecentralizesT: Unravels complex management topics through its software-embedded methodology, integrating consulting expertise with technology.
produtos_ThePlatformIsAimedAtCompanies: The platform is aimed at companies wishing to implement, sustain or leverage management, regardless of their level of maturity.
produtos_WeDevelopAndEmpowerPeopleAndOrg: My Menthor is a business partner for corporate areas that face the challenge of implementing, disseminating and improving various management models in the organization. This includes, among other areas, strategic planning, process management, risks and internal controls, quality, information technology, human resources, PMO and sustainability.
produtos_BusinessCorporateAndProcessArch: Business, corporate and process architects, internal consultants and management management specialists enjoy the benefits of comprehensive and robust modeling of the robust modeling of the business and governance components of enterprise architecture  offered by our platform.
produtos_MyMenthorIsAlsoAStrategicPartne: My Menthor is a strategic partner for management consultancies and independent consultants who wish to use the platform their clients' projects, ensuring the sustainability of the work and the improvements implemented after the project is completed.
produtos_VisibilityOfTheImpactOfChanges: Visibility of the impact of changes
produtos_GeneratingValueForStakeholders: Generating value for customers and partners
produtos_ReductionOfCostsDeadlinesAndRew: Reduction of costs, deadlines and rework
solutions_MyMenthorProvidesFunctionality: My Menthor provides functionality analysis for and helps identify the best approach and implementation strategy.
solutions_FacilitatesRethinkingOfMainAsp: Facilitates the rethinking of the main aspects of business identity, future vision and strategy, to guide the other organizational layers.
solutions_GuidesTheDeployment: Guides the deployment of the strategy for the processes of the value chain, taking into account the synergy with the functional vision.
solutions_FacilitatesTheMapping: Facilitates the mapping of strategy indicators, processes and projects, guiding them in an end-to-end vision.
solutions_SupportsTheCompleteCycle: Supports the complete cycle of implementation and governance of Business Process Management, from maturity assessment, value chain design design, process prioritization, transformation or improvement and architectural governance.
solutions_FacilitatesSynchronizationBetw: Facilitates synchronization between components (Organizational Structure, Risks and Controls, People, Technology and other corporate capabilities).
solutions_FacilitatesASISAndTOBEMapping: Facilitates AS IS and TO BE mapping, analysis of improvements and routine management.
solutions_FacilitatingChangesIn: Facilitating changes in organizational initiatives, projects and day-to-day changes.
solutions_WeCarryOutAssessment: We carry out assessment, implementation consultancy and setup and we help our clients develop a strategy and roadmap for implementation roadmap.
solutions_InAdditionToTheSoftware: In addition to the software, we also offer mentoring and consultancy services to ensure the client's success, monitoring their progress and boosting their results. We also guarantee continuous availability of the platform and specialize
solutions_WeAimForCustomer: We aim for customer success, guiding the user through the entire implementation journey, offering step-by-step implementation journey, guidance to achieve results, through knowledge base, targeted training and regular follow-up. Our aim is to ensure that each client achieves their objectives and extracts maximum value from our platform.
solutions_WeActAsBusinessPartners: We act as business partners in management solutions before, during and after implementation, in pursuit of effective results for our clients.
solutions_IdealForThose: Ideal for those who want to start with a small team and then expand their use.
solutions_ThePerfectChoice: The perfect choice for teams with a quick start.
solutions_ForCompaniesThatPrefer: For companies that prefer an integrated start.
solutions_CanBeCustomizedAccordingToCust: Can be customized according to customer's needs.
solutions_FrameworkKnowledgeBaseAndOnlin: Framework, Knowledge Base and Online Training
solutions_DataStorageLocation: Data storage location (USA - Washington and Dallas Data Centers)
solutions_SupportedBrowsers: Supported browsers: Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Safari and Microsoft Edge
solutions_ProprietaryMethodologyBasedOnB: Proprietary methodology based on best practices
solutions_AllFunctionalitiesCapabilities: All functionalities, capabilities and Organizational Components
clientesP_RegisterAndDiscover: Register and discover the benefits of our partner programs and how we can work together to achieve exceptional results.
clientesP_WeAreCommittedToTheContinuedSu: We are committed to the continued success of our clients, cultivating long-term relationships with a focus on results.

company_AMyMenthorIsTheResult: My Menthor is the result of over 20 years of experience in organizational management consulting transformed into a SaaS Technological Platform for Enterprise Architecture Management.
company_ItIsAProductDeveloped: It is a product developed by consulting companies specialized in Business Process Management, Aprimore, based in Brazil and Top Tier Business Group, in the United States.
company_ThatsWhenWeDevelopedASolution: We developed a solution capable of helping organizations in the process of implementing, sustaining and evolving the Business Architecture. We believe that our platform has the real potential to take organizations to a new level of management, providing effective value for customers and partners.
company_OurPurposeIsToImprove: Our purpose is to improve management capacity and boost corporate performance by integrating process-oriented organizational components, enhancing strategic execution and maximizing results.
